EXPERIENCE.title: Content Creator - Programming
EXPERIENCE.description: Generate content in the field of programming, teaching how to create engaging and eye-catching projects to attract more people to the fascinating world of programming.

EXPERIENCE.title: Full Stack Project - Ecommerce - MongoDb
EXPERIENCE.description: Led the development of the frontend side of the project, ensuring an attractive interface for the client. Implemented a CRUD system for managing client data, created APIs to facilitate communication between frontend and backend, and selected key libraries for the project's success.

EXPERIENCE.title: Full Stack Career - CODERHOUSE
EXPERIENCE.description: Completed the Full Stack Career at Coderhouse, acquiring a solid foundation in Frontend and Backend development. Now, I am focused on perfecting the skills provided during the training.

Presentacion.subtitle: Programmer Full Stack
Presentacion.description: Full stack web developer with experience in web application design and development using front-end and back-end technologies. Expert in creating interactive and functional solutions.

Sobremi.subsobre: years of experience programming web pages and creating interesting web pages.

descripcion.1: Hi! I'm Edu, a passionate Full Stack programmer with an exciting journey in the world of web development. I started my journey focusing on the frontend, exploring the wonders of HTML, CSS and JavaScript. My curiosity led me to immerse myself in an intensive program at CoderHouse, where I not only consolidated my existing knowledge but also acquired a high-quality Full Stack skill set.
descripcion.2: During my training at CoderHouse, I embarked on the challenging but rewarding career of Full Stack. As I progressed through the career, I was faced with ecommerce-centric projects where I was able to apply my skills to create solid and functional user experiences. The backend became my next challenge, and although it was a more complicated path, I found great satisfaction in overcoming each obstacle.
descripcion.3: My academic achievements in Full Stack were outstanding, and I am now at an exciting point in my career, ready to take my skills into the working world. My expertise lies not only in problem-solving and technical development but also in my love for the challenges I face on every project. I am determined to keep learning and constantly improving my skills to excel in the competitive working world of web development.

PROYECTOS.name: Ecommerce with Firebase
PROYECTOS.description: Customize your shopping experience by choosing the type of polo you want and add it to the cart. Upon completing the purchase, you will receive a ticket that is saved in the database.

PROYECTOS.name: Full Stack
PROYECTOS.description: Manage products, make purchases, and log in with your GitHub account. If you have admin permissions, you can create and delete products.

PROYECTOS.name: ArmalyTech Website
PROYECTOS.description: A website dedicated to cell phone repair and other technical services, offering direct contact with the technician.
